Account Users

List all Account Users

GET

/

platform

/

api

/

v1

/

accounts

/

{account\_id}

/

account\_users

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request GET \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/platform/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/account_users \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>'
```

200

401

Copy

```
[\
  {\
    "account_id": 123,\
    "user_id": 123,\
    "role": "<string>"\
  }\
]
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/account-users/list-all-account-users#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by the system admin after creating a platformApp. This token should be used to provision agent bots, accounts, users and their roles.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/account-users/list-all-account-users#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

#### Response

200

200401

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/account-users/list-all-account-users#response-account-id)

account\_id

integer

The ID of the account

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/account-users/list-all-account-users#response-user-id)

user\_id

integer

The ID of the user

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/account-users/list-all-account-users#response-role)

role

string

whether user is an administrator or agent
